name: CMIOExtensionStream.ClockType
desc: Constants that indicate the clock type of a stream.

items.name: case hostTime
items.desc: Indicates that the stream uses the host time clock.

items.name: case linkedCoreAudioDeviceUID
items.desc: Indicates that the stream uses the clock of the linked Core Audio device.

items.name: case custom
items.desc: Indicates that the streamâ€™s clock is specific to the device hosting the stream.
